Name: M 35 - Ms. Andrea Bierstein, New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR ANDREA BIERSTEIN AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY TAXI AND LIMOUSINE COMMISSION.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 2301 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of Andrea Bierstein as a member of the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission to serve the remainder of a seven-year term that will expire on January 31, 2029.
